item.title: What the history of Fed pauses says about stocks and bonds after the market freak-out
item.description: Citigroup has published a timely piece looking at the history of Fed pauses during previous easing cycles, now that a January change looks remote

item.title: The big connection between the yen and tech stocks has been severed
item.description: The yen was diving on Thursday, but that probably won’t help revive the so-called carry trade.

item.title: Buy the tech stock dip ahead of Trump rally, popular analyst says
item.description: Trump’s initiatives to boost America’s artificial intelligence (AI) sector will help the Magnificent Seven technology companies continue surging in 20...

item.title: Treasury yields mixed after huge spike; Morgan Stanley says January Fed rate cut still possible
item.description: Bond yields put in a mixed performance in early trade on Thursday, after a big spike following the Fed’s more cautious outlook on rates.

item.title: ‘I’m nervous about the market’: We’re living off my pension as practice for retirement, but I’m afraid of a market correction
item.description: My wife is younger than I am, and longevity runs in both our families.
